main_definition: To employ or engage someone in a job or service, typically by paying them.

meanings_and_examples.example: John was hired as an accountant at XYZ company.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Rented out or leased to someone else
meanings_and_examples.example: She hired her house to a couple during the summer months when she went on vacation.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Hired as an agent, representative, or intermediary
meanings_and_examples.example: He was hired by the company as their sales representative in Europe.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Adopted into a family or community not by birth but through social connection or agreement
meanings_and_examples.example: After her parents' passing, she was hired by the Smith family to live with them and help out around their farm.
